model.filemanagement

Class FileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.filemanagement.FileLoader

  • public class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class opens a file from disk or a an URL. It passes the file to the RLEDecoder for decoding of the RLE file
    Version:
    3.0 Created this class to separate file handling from the decoder and encoder
    See Also:
    RLEDecoder, RLEEncoder

        public boolean loadBoard(java.io.File f,
                         EncodeType type)
        This method loads a game board from file
        Parameters:
        f - The File to load
        type - The EncodeType of the board to load
        Returns:
        true if the board could be loaded. Otherwise false

      • decodeBoard

        private void decodeBoard(java.io.BufferedReader reader,
                         EncodeType type)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         PatternFormatException
        This method decodes the loaded board
        Parameters:
        reader - The BufferedReader to decode
        type - The EncodeType of the board to decode
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an unspecified I/O error occurs
        PatternFormatException - If the board could not be interpreted
